feed.title: Red Earth Creek - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Red Earth Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:08 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Earth 10:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Freezing rain over southern sections overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Freezing rain over southern sections early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
